comments:
Build ID: M20061212-0800

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Inserting a a verification hook and then playing back the test case results in the error below when using IBM JRE 1.5 with TPTP 4.2.1. Prior to this, when using IBM JRE 142, I was able to playback test cases with verification hooks (however when trying to change the verification hook class location (in overview tab) and then record and replay a test case, I would get the same error) see test cases org.eclipse.tptp.test.auto.gui.tests/manual/Test.UI.AutoGUIRunner VerificationHookLinkChange and VerificationHookInsertion to reproduce:

More information:
The code for the verification hook class is being generated correctly as is the Macro for the test case. I have tried verifying a Shell, Editor and View, all with the same results.

After some guidance from Ali I have determined that the verification hook failure was due to a configuration problem where the IAC and workbench versions of the JRE were differing. After resolution of this problem, I have re-run the tests that were producing this and they passed. Resolving bug as invalid.
Reporter: Please verify and close in preparation for shutting down the TPTP 4.4 release.  Thanks.
Verified that verification Hooks are working on Vista in TPTP 200705300100 driver.
